overview:
Benzion Aboud is CEO and founding member of SaveologyÂ®, a company that emerged in 2008 to provide performance-based marketing for technology services. On June 1, the company added a performance based media outlet to present curated daily deals from thousands of merchants to its over 4.5 million subscribers with promotions reaching an additional 300,000 new customers each month.

The Daily Deals 2.0 website offers innovative offers, a bigger rev share with the merchant to help local business and also have other back end opportunities including coupons and lead generators. Past deals have included educational offerings, experiences, and unique sports offers.

About Saveology Saveology is a new and innovative daily deal startup that features local, regional and national deals in 28 markets. Saveologyâ€™s performance based media outlet approach includes a larger revenue share with merchants, a lead generation program, a coupon generator and access to millions for brand awareness. The companyâ€™s daily deals offer local and national businesses unique deals ranging from car leases and excursions, to sporting events and family-fun packages.

The company originally started in 1996 as the Elephant Group and rebranded as Saveology in 2008. Beyond daily deals, the company does direct-to-consumer marketing, where they currently reach 4.5 million people per month via the companyâ€™s network of websites and through direct e-mail marketing.

To subscribe to deals, visit www.saveology.com. For home services, visit www.saveologyhomeservices.com.
